body.description: Content or message body of the conversation.

body_text.description: Text-only version of the message body.

incoming.description: Flag indicating if the conversation is incoming.

private.description: Flag indicating if the conversation is private.

user_id.description: User ID associated with the conversation.

support_email.description: Support email address associated with the conversation.

category.description: Category to which the conversation belongs.

from_email.description: Email address of the sender of the conversation.

cc_emails.description: List of CC emails involved in the conversation.

bcc_emails.description: List of BCC emails involved in the conversation.

created_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the conversation was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the conversation was last updated.

ticket_id.description: ID of the ticket related to the conversation.

source_additional_info.description: Additional info related to the source of the conversation.
